overview: Dorothy Parker remembers the heyday of the Algonquin Round Table, a circle of friends whose barbed wit, like hers, was fueled by alcohol and flirted with despair.
original_title: Mrs. Parker and the Vicious Circle
tagline: New York in the 1920's. The only place to be was the Algonquin, and the only person to know was Dorothy Parker.
cast: Jennifer Jason Leigh|Campbell Scott|Matthew Broderick|Peter Gallagher|Jennifer Beals
